title: Patient Management
description: MHIRA is conceptualised as an electronic health record centred around cases (i.e., patients). By creating a patient entry, the mental health care workers can access all the information about their patient in one site. The patient-centred view can be accessed by selecting the corresponding patient from the patient overview list.  The patient-centred view contains the subsections profile, departments, case managers, departments, caregivers, assessments and reports. To create a patient, the “create patient” button needs to be clicked. This will prompt the user to fill in the patient's profile.
